page.description: Returns the Memo file extension that would be associated with the passed in Table extension.

argument.name: Extension
argument.description: The filename extension that would be used for the table's memo file.

argument.name: Table_Extension
argument.description: The three character file type extension associated with any Alpha Anywhere table.

page.discussion: The TABLE.GET_MEMO_EXTENSION() method returns the extension of the associated memo file for a particular Alpha Anywhere object type.
